item.title: Jasmine Crockett Sees Congress As The Side Hustle To Her Full-Time ‘Influencer’ Gig
item.description: A recent article on Jasmine Crockett in The Atlantic reveals that she sees representing the American people as a mere side hustle.

item.title: Trump Must Resist Beijing’s Attempts to Sabotage America’s Panama Deal
item.description: The inclusion of a Chinese state-owned shipping company in this port deal would not just alter the agreement's original purpose but also jeopardize Am...

item.title: GOP Should Save College Sports For The Young Men Who Elected Them
item.description: Bill Clinton's misguided Title IX 'proportionality test' quotas are destroying men's non-revenue college sports.

item.title: Prepare For A Wave Of State Court Battles Over Men In Women’s Sports
item.description: State and local policies might still force sports organizations to deny the reality of male advantage.

item.title: Why Restorative Reproductive Medicine Is More Pro-Woman Than IVF
item.description: Restorative reproductive care is both medical and patient-centered, but is not yet standard practice for the treatment of infertility.
